comment: Took her online, perfect course to even out my harder classes. Her assignments always made sense, and she gave us a lot of credit. Super nice and easy to email! Take her, she's great!!!
Took her class for dual enrollment, excellent teacher would definitely recommend. Work load is not too heavy and cares about her students.

Professor Ryfun is a great teacher, who cares if her students are doing well or not. She is super nice, and this class was fun and easy. If you fail, you must have been trying to, because if you do the assignments on time, it will be an easy A. Also she gives some extra credit to boost your grade at the end of the semester.

Very nice professor and was great with feedback on essays. The textbook isn't needed at all she has short 5-10 minute lectures going over the chapters and the questions from the quizzes come from the lectures. Very simple class and not that much of a workload.
Not much really needs to be said. She's the best teacher I've had so far since I've been here.

She's a great teacher whose class is super easy as long as you put in actual effort. There are a lot of papers but you have plenty of time. They're only 2-3 full pages. She's really clear with feedback understanding. I know I only got a B but that was dumb fault for skipping discussions. You can EASILY get an A. Best part: she grades individually.
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback--So many papers

comment: This class is extremely easy as long as you pay attention to the lectures which are usually about 10 minutes. About 4 essays in total and one project but she lets you revise on the essays. Very helpful and caring. My favorite professor Ive had.
loved her, she made the class easy and gave great feedback was easy to talk to and the work was easy just essays.
rating_tags: EXTRA CREDIT--Gives good feedback--So many papers

comment: I had this teacher for my first class at college. Let me just say, she set the bar high for my future classes. She was amazing at teaching and would let us out early with a brief lecture, straight to the point, and maybe a group discussion. All of the assignments were helpful and easy to understand. Overall it was a great class!!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class--Clear grading criteria

comment: She was honestly such a good professor and cared so much and was super chill!
The only work given in this class is discussions and essays but very simple. Gives very good feedback and extra credit opportunities at the end of the semester.

Professor Ryfun is a gem. She is very sweet and knowledgeable. She cares about her students and gives really good feedback. She helped me improve my writing style and apply it to other subjects. She helped me elevate my writing skills to a whole new level. She is understanding and helpful in every way. Run to her class, she is one of the best.
One of the best professors I've had so far. She is very chill and gives lots of feedback. If you do your work, it's an easy A! We had 3 essays, weekly DBAs, and a final multimedia project.

Professor Ryfun was my 1st professor for English. She helped me feel more confident about my writing. The essays were cool because I got to write what I was interested in. There were no tests or quizzes. There are discussion posts every week but they are very easy. She is so nice and offers amazing feedback essays TAKE HER!!!

I had Professor Ryfun for English 1101 for my first ever semester of college and she is one of the best professors I have ever had in English. There are a bit of essays but no tests. She gives great feedback on your essays and does not make you feel like a terrible writer. Overall I would take her again for English 1102 if she was teaching it.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class--Clear grading criteria

comment: I love prof. Cara! She explains content very well and gives outlines for what she expects. All we did was essays and discussion posts (which you get a 100 on if you put effort). She is very kind and always willing to help out. Essay topics were not difficult but papers are usually around 4 pages. 10/10 would recommend
Cara Ryfun is an excellent teacher with great qualities. When I took her class, I had no troubles what so ever.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class--EXTRA CREDIT

comment: I did not have many classes with Mrs. Ryfun. However, when I was in her class she was very kind and an inspirational professor. Her course is intriguing and engaging, along with the fact that this class overall is an easy A. I would definitely recommend her to anyone. Also you have to write 2 papers and do a project, super easy though.

She is amazing! The best English teacher I've had. She is kind and smart, and shows genuine concern for your success. She is great at explaining material and assignments, and is consistent in her dates, grading criteria, and feedback. If you are not a writer, she will set you on the right path. If you can take other English classes with her, do it!

Professor Cara is the BEST! She is super sweet and encourages you to be true to yourself in your writings. We worked on a bibliography all semester long, which she walked us through step by step. She responds to her emails super quick and she is so understanding. As long as you put in some effort, you are guaranteed an easy A.

I highly recommend Prof Cara Ryfun! She has a clear schedule for each week, which allows students to time manage and get everything done well. She provides a clear guide for exactly what she is looking for, for each assignment. She also provides feedback for each of your first drafts of each assignment. Overall, one of the best professors I've had!

My second time having professor Cara, she is always looking out for her students and willing to work with them. Discussions help with the papers and the expectations are clearly laid out. Easy to understand directions, nothing is too difficult. The lectures go with the textbooks you dont have to read them to do well on the quizzes. Please take her!

literally the best professor ever. she genuinely cares about her students and is so laid back. she answers your emails fast and gives you answers to everything you need. her quizzes are easy and theres 4 essays total. no test. discussion post are easy too.
Super great class and it wont stress you out.
Very easy lit class. She also gives great feedback.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Clear grading criteria--EXTRA CREDIT

comment: Great professor, she gives great feedback on essays and all of them aren't hard. I would highly recommend.

I took Professor Ryfun online. AMAZING professor! Theres a weekly checklist each week with 5-7 things you have to complete by the end of the week, which makes a EASY A. Her papers are super easy & ARENT overwhelming. She gives good feedback & really cares about her students. No lockdown browser & one quiz a week. Highly recommend!

My favorite professor of all time! She does not over load you with work and the paper requirements are not overwhelming. She provides lectures over the textbook chapters which are very clear and easy to follow and then prepare you for the quizzes. I would totally recommend her and I would 100% take this class again!

I took this class for ENGL1101 online, and it's easy. Her due dates are clear, she has a prerecorded lecture for each week, and the longest lecture is around 15 mins. Just do your work, and you'll be fine. She's very nice and gives great feedback on essays. I would recommend this class to any freshman, looking for a spring semester ENGL professor

She is the nicest person I have ever met. She is really easy to reach through email and she definitely cares about her students' success. Her grading criteria is clear and she is more than reasonable with due dates. Take her, you won't regret it.

She's an amazing professor! There are 3 papers (Annotated Bibliography, Literature Review, Proposal) and 1 final project. There are also weekly discussion posts to turn in, averaging 200 words each. If you do the work, you get the the grade. I never got below a 98 on anything. She also gives you very helpful feedback on all your assignments.

She is so nice gives grades back super fast which I love. You turn in a rough draft a week before every paper and she gives you really helpful feedback. Allows a revision on ALL papers under an A for FULL credit back at the end of the semester. There are a lot of discussion post but they are really easy and don't take a long time to do. TAKE HER!!!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class--Participation matters

comment: the best professor! she gives personal feedback on all the essays rough drafts and it is super helpful. you have 3 papers, 1 project, and 2 very easy weekly discussion posts based off of what you did in class. super kind and caring. responds to emails fast. easy grader she is not harsh and if you follow the criteria you are bound to get an A!

Had her for ENGL 1101, she is such a nice, caring professor. Her classes can be a bit boring, but it is worth it because she is not a strict grader. She lets you know what you are doing wrong in your first drafts so you can improve for the final. Very easy A if you show up, pay attention, and do all the work.

I took her for both 1111 and 1112 because she is so amazing. No tests, you just present a paper for a final. All her assignments are easy to understand and she is always willing to help. Take her for sure.

She was a great Professor and was a super awesome person. She really cared about how you did in the class and wanted you to get a good grade. She made class fun and enjoyable to attend too. Overall she was a great Professor and i would take her again if i could.

This was my first semester at Kennesaw and was a super easy A. Professor Ryfun is super sweet and super helpful. You turn in your rough draft a week before your final draft and she edits the whole thing. 100% WOULD RECOMMEND!!! Best class ever!

The sweetest professor ever, she gives line by line feedback on rough drafts so it's impossible to not get an A on papers, essays are on very interesting topics and by the time you write it you're totally prepared. You have discussion posts about the paper you're writing, and there's 3 papers and a presentation. Such an easy class and an easy A.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class--Clear grading criteria

comment: EASIEST CLASS EVER!! She is a very easy grader and is always available for help. She has a textbook but you don't have to read it because she goes over it in class and you are never tested over the material. There were 3 essays, lots of discussion posts, and a final (which recomposes one of the esssays). Take her if you can!!

Take her! She assigned textbook chapters, but they are not necessary to read. For every rough draft we get feedback and it is very helpful. She is a very easy grader. You get graded on attendance. Only 3 essays and a final. No tests or quizzes. She was very kind and open to giving explanations. You can revise your essays for a better grade.

Prof Ryfun made the class easy and manageable. if you have the chance, take her. the class is composed of 3 papers (for me it was a literacy narrative, a rhetorical analysis, and an art analysis) and the final is making one of the papers into a multimedia format. weekly discussion posts and easy textbook readings.

Great Professor, we had 3 papers you turn in your first draft then she revises it then next week you turn your final in. One project at the end of the year, no tests and the only homework is one 300 word discussion post due Sunday. You only go to class on Monday and Wednesday. Easy class but an amazing teacher who cares and helps you improve!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Skip class? You won't pass.--Inspirational

comment: One of the best English professors ever, hands down. She makes her class easy and enjoyable. My class had no quizzes, tests, or a final. She also goes over what's in the textbook in class on a PPT, so you don't have to buy a textbook. I used to hate English with a passion but she has made me re-think my mindset.

second time I took her because of how great of a teacher she is. She really cares about her students and makes a gen ed English class more than bearable. Pretty much dont buy the book, show up, and do your work and you have a high A. Such a nice and genuine person aswell, we need more professors like her on campus

Very strict with attendance but other than that she has been the best teacher I have had in my first semester of college. I took English 1101, she told us to buy a book but I saw we were never using it in the first couple weeks so I never bought one. We opened it up 3 times all semester.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Skip class? You won't pass.--Caring

comment: The easiest English teacher at KSU. The class consists of watching a video or reading a book, doing a discussion post and leaving. When we have to write papers, she gives amazing feedback and if you listen to it you will receive a 95-100 on every paper. You're dumb not to take her

Great teacher!! Totally recommend! Grades very fairly and gives good feedback! You will most than likely pass this class if you come to class and just complete the assignments. If you need an easy core class like ENG1101 or 1102, take her!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Skip class? You won't pass.--Caring

comment: SHE IS AMAZING! Every day in class you will have discussion post but it only has to be 200 words. It is a very low pressure class. She also gives individual feedback on every assignment which makes you feel like you have a more personal connection with her. I would take her again any day. She is actually still in college so she is very relatable!

She is a great, caring and very nice professor. If you want an easy A in the class, definitely would recommend taking her. As long as you show up to classes and do the discussion posts - you will most likely pass. She also gives an opportunity to improve your grade on your essay, so it is nearly impossible to fail her class.

Professor Ryfun is super nice. I love her! she is also very understanding. She does not want to see any of her students do poorly so she helps a lot with essays as you are writing them to ensure that you as good as you can once she grades them. I am a first year freshman and I will be taking her 1102 class. There are a lot of discussion post.
